title: Ember CMS (MVP)
subtitle: developer oriented headless CMSs
intro: This is a CMS I built from scratch with a fully featured content creation tool suite such as a rich text editor that can handle inline images or embedded videos. The CMS also features a media library solution for easy integration and publishing of media such as images or videos. It uses Google Firestore and Google Cloud in the back-end. It connects to the front end either as a traditional REST API with multiple end points or with the custom built GraphQL server and endpoint. This portfolio’s content is 100% powered by Ember CMS!
